snippet.title: Gameboy Color Longplay [031] Rainbow Islands
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

GBC port of the popular game. All levels complete for best ending, if you can call it that ....

Im not sure if this is emulated properly as there is a fair bit of gfx flickering but here it is anway. As good as the bubble bobble theme is, it will drive you mad after hearing it on nearly every level Wink

In one of the early levels I collect the diamonds in order but nothing special happens in this version. It is however quite easy no manipulate the diamond drops in this version. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
